high_descs: Turn right and take a step then take a step to your right then walk past the bed and turn right and walk to the dresser.
Pick up the alarm clock that's in front of you.
Turn around and walk past the bed then turn left and walk to the night stand.
Turn on the light that's on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a clock by lamp light.

high_descs: Turn right, walk to the door, then turn right and walk forward to the alarm clock near the window.
Pick up the alarm clock from the dresser.
Turn around, walk forward to the door, then turn left and walk to the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine an alarm clock by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the dresser across the room, underneath the window.
Pick up the alarm clock in the back, right corner of the dresser.
Turn around and go to the end of the bed and turn left, then go to the desk by the top of the bed.
Turn on the lamp in the back, right corner of the desk.
